ygData.subject: Re: Topaz, and minor illus
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, - Topaz : I ve been toying back into the gems list just to check out any differences. But this time there was a supply of Topaz nearby. With one gem and
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,

- Topaz : I've been toying back into the gems list just to check out any
differences. But this time there was a supply of Topaz nearby. With one gem
and one silver I got : "you cant combine things with the current
proportion" or something like that . Has anyone tried ever 2 bars and one
topaz?.

- Minor Illus : I've heard lot of ppl complaining this one was broken?!?.
As of last Wenesday, it saved my butt time and again. Last eg: In Befallen,
Guidor Modot (sp) go on rampage and clear level one of all unlucky players.
It never bothered a pack of bone (me, meditating) and bone's trusty pet. I
had lvl 1 all for myself for sometime after that.

This spell is faster, wears off after, and is cheaper on mana than Sentinel.

my two jade rings

Ibnabeth / Karada
